#summary The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO)
#sidebar SIOSideBar

= Introduction =

The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO) provides a simple, integrated ontology of types and relations for rich description of objects, processes and their attributes. A draft of the SIO paper is available is now [https://semanticscience.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wiki/SIO-the-paper.pdf available].

The OWL2 ontology is available at

http://semanticscience.org/ontology/sio.owl

view with
 * the manchester ontology viewer: [http://owl.cs.manchester.ac.uk/browser/]
 * bioportal: [http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1532 sio@bioportal]

This project provides foundational support for the Bio2RDF (http://bio2rdf.org) and SADI (http://sadiframework.org) projects. It is also being used for DisGeNET (http://rdf.imim.es/DisGeNET.html) for representing gene-disease associations.


= Details =

Documentation is under development. Design patterns are being defined, which are listed on the left hand pane.  If you have questions please send to SIO mailing list (sio-ontology@googlegroups.com; http://groups.google.com/group/sio-ontology)
